Hong Song Nam meets Libyan guests
     Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of the Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya led by Mohamed M. al-Higazi, secretary of the Youth and Sport of the General People's Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
